    • Method Detail

      • getAuthor

        public static java.lang.String getAuthor(java.util.Scanner input)
        Static method that gets a Scanner so that it can ask the user for an author to search for
        Parameters:
        input - Scanner object to get user input
        Returns:
        String containing the author to search for, formatted as uppercase first letter and lowercase for the rest

      • readFiles

        public static void readFiles(java.util.Scanner sc)
                      throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Static method that will read all the .bib files present in the directories
        Parameters:
        sc - Scanner object to read all the files that need to be read
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - thrown when there is a file that is missing

      • checkFiles

        public static void checkFiles(java.lang.String author)
                       throws FileExistsException
        Static method to check if the files with the author that is searched for already exists
        Parameters:
        author - Author to check for
        Throws:
        FileExistsException - thrown when a file is found with the author's name

      • fileExistsMsg

        public static java.lang.String fileExistsMsg(java.lang.String name)
        Static method to create a String with all the message
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the file that exists
        Returns:
        Full String with the proper message

      • backup

        public static void backup(java.lang.String author,
                          boolean[] fileCheck)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Static method to turn all the existing files into "-BU.json" files
        Parameters:
        author - Author that is searched for
        fileCheck - Array of booleans obtained from FileExistsException that says which files needs to be backed up
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown when old file could not be copied

      • outputFiles

        public static void outputFiles(java.lang.String author)
                        throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Static method to write up all the output files with the proper formatting
        Parameters:
        author - Author to search for
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - thrown when a new file could not be made

      • processBibFiles

        public static void processBibFiles(java.util.Scanner input,
                                   java.util.Scanner sc)
        Static method that serves as the core engine of the program. Catches all the exceptions thrown from the other static methods.
        Parameters:
        input - Scanner that serves as user input
        sc - Scanner that serves to read files

      • deleteThis

        public static void deleteThis(java.lang.String author)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Static method to delete the files that have been created if the output method fails
        Parameters:
        author - Author to check for
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown when a file could not be deleted
